languages.text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} мертвеца — члена вашей семьи — прямо здесь, в своем дворце. Он умер во время молитвы, стоя на коленях".

traits.locale_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} мертвеца — члена вашей семьи — прямо здесь, в своем дворце. Он умер во время молитвы, стоя на коленях".

languages.text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."
languages.original_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} мертвеца — члена вашей семьи — прямо здесь, в своем дворце. Он умер во время молитвы, стоя на коленях".

traits.locale_text: "I discovered a corpse — of one of your family members— right here at my palace. He had died during a prayer, standing on his knees."
"I discovered a corpse — of one of your family members— right here at my palace. He had died during a prayer, standing on his knees."
"I discovered a corpse—of one of your family members—right here at my palace. He died during a prayer as he was kneeling."
"I discovered a corpse—of one of your family members—right here at my palace. He died during a prayer as he was kneeling."
"I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."
"I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

languages.text: 「死体を見つけた…お前の家族の者だ…まさにここ、私の宮殿で。彼はひざまずいたまま、祈りながら死んでいた」
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

traits.locale_text: 「死体を見つけた…お前の家族の者だ…まさにここ、私の宮殿で。彼はひざまずいたまま、祈りながら死んでいた」

languages.text: “我在宫殿里发现了一具尸体，是你们贾帕克家族的人。他是在跪地祈祷时丧命的。”
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

traits.locale_text: “我在我的宫殿里发现了一具尸体，是你们贾帕克家族的人。他是在跪地祈祷时丧命的。”

languages.text: « J'ai découvert le cadavre de l'un des membres de votre maison dans mon palais. Il est mort en pleine prière. »
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai découvert le cadavre de l'un des membres de votre famille dans mon palais. Il est mort en pleine prière. »

languages.text: «Encontré el cadáver de un miembro de su casa aquí, en mi palacio. Murió de rodillas mientras rezaba».
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

traits.locale_text: «Encontré el cadáver de un familiar suyo aquí en mi palacio. Murió de rodillas mientras rezaba».

languages.text: "Ich habe eine Leiche entdeckt, hier in meinem Palast. Ein Mitglied Eures Hauses. Er ist im Knien gestorben, beim Beten."
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe hier in meinem Palast eine Leiche entdeckt. Ein Mitglied Eurer Familie. Er ist gestorben, während er auf seinen Knien gebetet hat."

languages.text: "Sarayımda hanenizden birinin cansız bedenini buldum. Dizlerinin üstünde dua ederken ölmüş."
languages.original_text: "I discovered a dead body — a member of your house — right here in my palace. He died kneeling in prayer."

traits.locale_text: "Sarayımda hanenizden birinin cansız bedenini buldum. Dizlerinin üstünde dua ederken ölmüş."
